snippet.title: Borderlands 4: 10 WEIRD Legendary Weapons That Make Your Question Everything
snippet.description:
Vault Hunters, Borderlands 4 is packed with legendary loot, but today we’re showcasing 10 of the weirdest legendary weapons in the game. From Katagawa’s Revenge dual fire modes and the explosive Kickballer shotgun, to the chaotic Chuck and the bizarre Frangible world drop, these guns redefine what it means to be legendary. We’ll show you why each weapon is weird, how its unique perk works, and where to farm it. If you’re hunting Borderlands 4 legendaries, loot farming spots, and overpowered builds, this guide is for you.

0:00 Intro
0:38 Katagawa’s Revenge
1:54 Kickballer
3:03 Chuck
4:38 Sweet Embrace
5:44 Spinning Blade
6:59 Seventh Sense
8:07 Kaleidosplode
9:02 Frangible
10:12 Streamer
11:17 T.K.’s Wave
12:18 Subscribe For More Borderlands 4
